name: admin.apps.approve
desc: Approve an app for installation on a workspace.

app_id.desc: The id of the app to approve.

enterprise_id.desc: The ID of the enterprise to approve the app on.

request_id.desc: The id of the request to approve.

team_id.desc: The ID of the workspace to approve the app on.

errors.app_management_app_not_installed_on_org: The app management app must be installed on the org.
errors.app_restricted_org_wide: The app is already restricted org wide.
errors.custom_integration_not_allowed_at_enterp: Returned when the install request is for custom integration app.
errors.feature_not_enabled: Returned when the Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team
errors.org_resolution_required: The `team_id` is in an Enterprise org while `app_id` is certified.
errors.invalid_scopes: Some of the provided scopes do not exist
errors.not_an_admin: This method is only accessible by org owners and admins
errors.request_already_resolved: The app request has already been resolved
errors.request_id_required_for_custom_integrati: A `request_id` is required for custom integrations
errors.team_not_found: Returned when team id is not found.
